paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data for carriers.

patients.phenotype: significant family history of breast and ovarian cancer, diagnosed with fibroadenoma

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One patient with a BRCA2 mutation [NM_000059.4(BRCA2):c.1800T>G (p.Tyr600Ter)] was a 20-year-old African American woman with a significant family history of breast and ovarian cancer who was diagnosed with fibroadenoma in 2018.

functional_data.summary: The functional impact of the variant is not detailed in the paper.

variants.segregation_data: The paper does not provide segregation data for this variant.
variants.evidence_level: The evidence for pathogenicity is based on family history and clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified in a research setting.
key_quotes: One patient with a BRCA2 mutation [NM_000059.4(BRCA2):c.1800T>G (p.Tyr600Ter)] was a 20-year-old African American woman with a significant family history of breast and ovarian cancer who was diagnosed with fibroadenoma in 2018.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the BRCA2 variant was extracted successfully.
